nws_periods.name: Today
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 10am. Sunny, with a high near 94. North wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 75. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
